snippet: Sarai Sierra kept up with friends and family via social media when she traveled to Turkey, and that connectedness may have given her a false sense of security.
abstract: Body of Sarai Sierra, who was killed while on vacation in Istanbul, Turkey, is returned to her family in Staten Island, NY, but many questions about her mysterious death, and her trip, remain unanswered.

byline.contributor: Sebnem Arsu contributed reporting from Istanbul, and Christopher Maag from New York.

lead_paragraph: Sarai Sierra kept up with friends and family via social media when she traveled to Turkey, and that connectedness may have given her a false sense of security.

headline.seo: Sarai Sierra’s Body Is Returned From Turkey, but Mystery Remains
headline.main: Mystery Deepens as Staten Island Woman’s Body Is Returned From Turkey
headline.print_headline: Mystery Deepens as Staten Island Woman’s Body Is Returned From Turkey
